short_summary: Purchase and delivery of pop-up banners
description: Purchase and delivery of pop-up banners for the upcoming 45th Election; a composite order for 1,390 units consisting of 1,070 English and 320 French pop-up banners.
full_summary:
### 45th General Election CRO Banners Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** cb-7090-70576194
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** ECJM-RFP-2023-2284
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-11
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-01 14:00:00 (note: time is assumed to be in local time)

**Background:**
The Office of the Chief Electoral Officer of Canada, as an agent of Parliament, oversees the conduct of federal elections and referendums. This procurement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under Contract Number EN578-191297/C.

**Requirement:**
The Chief Electoral Officer of Canada requires the production and supply of pop-up banners for the 45th general election. There are two types of banners to be produced:

* 1,070 pop-up banners, measuring 33.5" wide x 78.7" in English
* 320 pop-up banners, measuring 33.5" wide x 78.7" in French

**Services Required:**
The successful supplier will be responsible for:

* Providing all necessary materials
* Printing and producing banners in accordance with provided artwork
* Supplying proofs to the Project Authority prior to production
* Packaging and delivering all items according to specified requirements

**Contract Period:**
The contract will commence from the Effective Date of the Contract until October 18, 2023. The supplier may exercise one (1) additional option to extend the contract period by six (6) months under the same terms and conditions.

**Submission of Proposals:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically using Canada Post's Connect service or in hard copy, addressed to the Contracting Authority, on or before the tender closing date. For further information on the submission requirements and electronic transmission, refer to Part 2 and Part 3 of the RFP document.

**Security Requirements:**
There are no security requirements applicable to this procurement.

**Enquiries and Debriefing:**
Enquiries and any communication with Elections Canada personnel should be directed only to the Contracting Authority. The successful bidder will be announced, and unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the RFP process.

**Tender Evaluation Criteria:**

The tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Attachments:**
Please refer to the RFP document for any additional information or attachments.
